metadata.name: KUMADE 2023
metadata.description:
Artist: Shinsei Galverse Ã— Sneakerwolf

The kumade is a talisman that wishes for prosperity in business, safety in the home, and other good fortune.
Why is the kumade considered a good luck charm? Representing an old farm tool used to rake up fallen leaves and other debris, the kumade has come to be associated with the meaning of "stirring up luck" or "stirring up money".

This is a project where you can purchase both a REAL KUMADE and a NFT KUMADE.
The Galverse NFT KUMADE is customizable at mint. Choose between 6 Gal characters to place in any of the 4 kumade slots, which can then be minted as an original 3D NFT.

The copyright belongs to the artist.  
Commercial use is prohibited.
Secondary sales commission (artist): 5% of sales price
Secondary sales commission (XYZA): 2.5% of sales price
